metadata.title: CVE-2022-0135 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was found in the VirGL virtual OpenGL renderer(virglrenderer). This flaw allows a malicious guest to create a speciallycrafted virgil resource and then issue a VIRTGPU_EXECBUFFER ioctl, leadingto a denial of service or possible code execution.

criterions.comment: virglrenderer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
